cause.description:
Prior to the advent of applications, Facebook was plainly the best social networking site available. Applications changed that: by enabling profile-clutter and friend-spam, applications bring some of the worst parts of MySpace into Facebook.
The Application Resistance Front is a coalition of Facebook users standing united against the spread of these useless and pointless applications. Together, we can stamp out the worst offenders.
1. Facebook (pre-applications) was the premier social networking site
2. Certain applications have begun to ruin the positive aspects of Facebook.
cause.mission: Reduce and eliminate frivolous applications on Facebook.
cause.name: The Application Resistance Front
